Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2014 04:21PM Twofer wrote: Hi Sam.  I think it is highly individual.  You may be able to squeak through.  I have been putting on just under 1kg per month since the Letrozole despite low carb/strictly controlled diet, thrice weekly gym work (when the bones co-operate) and regular walking.  My Onc tells me to grin and bear it :-j  I'm just one of those unfortunates who needs Estrogen to lose weight, so that's not going to happen.  I would be happy if my brain started to work again!  Good luck
Posts.Title: Question about zolodex and femara sammiryan Twofer
